###### Embrace the Digital Asset Marketplace

# List Tokenized IPOs and Digital Assets on Your Stock Exchange

##### Attract more listings and higher trading volume with the compliant
tokenization, trading, clearing, and settlement of digital assets in your
financial ecosystem.

Book Demo

##### Full-Service Platform

End-to-end listing, trading, clearing and settlement for your ecosystem
partners

End-to-End Solution  arrow_right_alt

##### Attract Listings, Drive Volume

Tokenized IPOs and digital assets reduce costs and increase accessibility for

Tokenized IPOs  arrow_right_alt

##### Fully Compliant

Learn More  arrow_right_alt

#### Our Partners - Regulated Financial Institutions

### "We are very comfortable moving forward based on the training and support
provided by Blockstation, because their trading platform incorporates familiar
compliance rules to ensure a fair marketplace."

##### **Marlene Street Forrest**

###### Managing Director, JSE

###### An Ecosystem Solution

## The Blockstation Digital Asset Trading Platform

The Blockstation Digital asset Trading Platform provides end-to-end, plug-and-
play support for listing, trading, clearing and settlement of digital assets
such as Tokenized IPOs and digital currencies for all market participants.

Book Demo

###### All-Participant Support

## Plug-and-Play Modules for the Entire Capital Markets Ecosystem

##### Stock Exchange

Broker and issuer on-boarding, market management, transaction authorization,
audits, reports

##### Broker-Dealer

Client KYC and AML, trade management, marketplace for issuer offerings, and
raise management

##### Depository

Block Depository enables secure custodianship, clearing and settlement of
digital assets with 100% insurance

##### Issuer

Prospectus+ Smart Listing Accelerator Portal (SLAP) and lifecycle management
(corporate actions, votes, audits, etc)

##### Investor

Full-service management of digital asset portfolio including trades and bank
deposits/withdrawals

##### Regulator

Real-time monitoring of market activity for illicit behavior and compliant
provenance of funds

Book Demo

###### Plug-and-Play

## Easy Implementation

Access our innovative platform via API or through a secure portal, enabling
blockchain-based workflow for your organization without the expense of costly
upgrades.

Book Demo

###### Tokenized IPOs

## Attract International Issuers & Drive Volume

Attract more issuers with the Prospectus+ Smart Listing Accelerator Portal
(SLAP), which can reduce the time and cost of going public by as much as 80%.

Attract international issuers & investors by enabling Tokenized IPOs on your
stock exchange.

About Tokenized IPOs  arrow_right_alt  Download Case Study  arrow_right_alt

###### Compliance at the core

## Compliance-First Architecture

Designed with compliance in mind from day one and powered by the ChainWatch
AML tool, ensuring compatibility with your KYC/CFT regime.

About ChainWatch  launch

##### Attract more listings and higher trading volume with the compliant
tokenization, trading, clearing, and settlement of digital assets in your

# **Fast. Simple. Efficient.**

## Raise capital on the stock exchange by tokenizing your equity or asset

Check If You Qualify





##### 1\. Qualify



##### 2\. Tokenize with Prospectus+



##### 3\. List & Trade

## Introducing **Tokenized IPO** (STO)

An IPO for the digital age

##### Raise Capital Internationally

Raise from public investors around the world via fiat and digital currency

##### List on a Regulated Stock Exchange

Trade tokenized shares or assets in a safe, insured, trusted marketplace

##### Save Time & Cost

With the Prospectus+, create, submit, and obtain approval for your prospectus
in as little as 60 business days

Book a Consultation _today_

###### The Blueprint for your next raise

## Download the Tokenized IPO Case Study

See how a Tokenized IPO (aka Security Token Offering) can help your company
reach more investors in less time at lower cost.

Download Case Study

###### Financial markets evolved

## How It **Works**

Prospectus+ Smart Listing Accelerator Portal (SLAP). Real-time review and
approval. Streamlined corporate actions. Welcome to a Blockstation Tokenized
IPO.



  * _add_

##### Create Prospectus

  * _fact_check_

##### Submit & Approve

  * _show_chart_

##### Raise

  * _pie_chart_

##### Manage

EST. TIME: 3 days

### Create Your Prospectus

  * Fast, click-through prospectus
  * Easy smart contracts
  * Share tokenization
  * 90% cost saving vs. IPO

EST. TIME: 2 months

### Submit & Approve

  * Real-time review by all stakeholders including legal, broker, stock exchange, and regulator
  * Centralized, efficient revisions and resubmission
  * Over 80% faster vs. IPO

Ongoing

### Raise Capital

  * Attract small, medium, and large retail investors internationally
  * Minimize transfer fees by accepting digital currency in addition to fiat currencies
  * Work with a reputable and regulated broker to facilitate your capital raise

Ongoing

### Streamline Corporate Actions

  * Real-time reports and cap table management
  * Accurate, up-to-date shareholder data
  * Fast, efficient votes and dividend payments
  * Long-term cost savings vs. IPO

###### Financial markets evolved

## A Better Way to **Raise Capital**

Why do an STO over a private offering, IPOs, or even ICOs?

_sync_alt_

  |

#### Blockstation STO

Flexible, Global, Regulated

|

#### ICO

Unsecured, Unregulated

|

#### IPO

Regulated, Costly

|

#### Private Offering

Restrictive, Illiquid  
  
---|---|---|---|---  
Cost of Initial Offering | $50K | $250 - 300K | $500K - 1M | $0 - 200K  
Time Required | 2-6 months | 2-6 months | 12-24 months | 2-6 months  
Corporate Actions Efficiency | High | Med | Low | High  
Global Reach | High | High | Low | Low  
Regulatory Certainty | High | Low | High | Low  
Liquidity | High | High | High | Low  
Reporting Requirements | Quarterly | None | Quarterly | None  
Investor Pool | Accredited, Institutional & Retail (small, med, large) |
Accredited, Institutional & Retail (small, med, large) | Accredited,
Institutional & Retail (med, large) | Accredited (mostly)

#### Picture a digital, fully compliant IPO that’s faster, more cost-
effective, improves investor reach worldwide and increases liquidity - that’s
a Blockstation STO. Anyone looking to go public owes it to themself to give
Blockstation serious consideration.

#### Jag Basrai

President & CEO

###### Regulated Financial Institutions

## Our Partners

Named the world's top-performing stock exchange by _Bloomberg Businessweek_
for 2015 and 2018, the JSE has a market cap of over $2 trillion and is
pioneering the regulated, compliant exchange of digital assets in traditional
capital markets.

Member of the Jamaica Stock Exchange and a leading brokerage in Jamaica.

Diversified financial services company and member of the Jamaica Stock
Exchange.

Dedicated to “Making More Possible,” CUFM provides investment products and
services.

Leading provider of wealth management/ investment advisory services, and
securities trading and sales.

## STO **Readings**

More on our Blog _arrow_forward_



### STOs and the sexy side of your friendly, neighborhood broker dealer

In 2017, the SEC shortened the clearing and settlement period for equity
capital markets from T+3 days to T+2, reflecting improvements in technology
that save investment brokers time and money

by Jai Waterman

STO



### Athletes and FinTechs and STOs… oh, my!

The 2019 Athlete Tech Summit in Toronto brought pro athletes and tech start-
ups together to explore mutually beneficial investment opportunities

by Jai Waterman

STO



### Making dividend payouts more accessible to issuers: The promise of
Security Token Offerings (STOs)

Most publicly traded companies don’t issue dividends, even though it can
increase the attractiveness of their stock to investors.

by Jai Waterman

STO

## Largest

Investor Pool & Reach

## 90%

Cost Saving vs IPO

## 80%+

Faster than IPO

## High Liquidity

vs Private Offering

###### STO Technology

## Core **Benefits**

_account_balance_

##### Trusted Financial Ecosystem

Create and issue a fully compliant security token in the traditional,
regulated financial ecosystem of stock exchanges and investment brokers. By
leveraging the authority of traditional financial institutions, Blockstation
includes 100% insurance coverage on crypto assets held by you and your
investors.

_dashboard_

##### Tokenize Any Asset

Raise capital for equity- or asset-backed shares in corporations as well as
individual product lines or real estate projects. Further, STOs can unlock
value from typically illiquid holdings like art, intellectual property, or
even endorsement deals. Whatever your asset, there’s an STO for that.

_public_

##### Global Liquidity

Reach institutional and retail investors - of all sizes - around the world
through fractionalized ownership and reduced wire transfer fees by accepting
digital currencies as well as fiat currencies, providing T+0 clearing and
settlement on all trades.

_category_

##### Powered by the Blockchain

Benefit from T+0 transactions with efficient, real-time cap table management
and other corporate actions including shareholder communication, votes,
dividend payments, prevention and monitoring of abusive trading practices, and
more.

_admin_panel_settings_

##### Smart & Secure

Smart contracts bake trading rules and restrictions into your token, stopping
illicit trades, naked short selling, failed trades, and other market risks
before they start. Further, the blockchain provides an immutable and accurate
record of shareholder activity for fast, efficient and compliant reporting.
